content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava. May I have your name to get started with booking your HVAC service?
Just call me Mr. Carter. And I want to know what this is going to cost before I say anything else.
Thank you, Mr. Carter. To give you an accurate price estimate, could you please tell me a bit about the HVAC issue you're experiencing?
It's blowing hot air instead of cold. How much to fix it? And don't tell me you can't give me a quote.
Thank you for the details. Let me check if I can provide an estimate for this HVAC issue.

Based on your description, the price to repair an HVAC blowing hot air can vary widely depending on the specific problem—typically, it ranges from $150 to $600. Would you like to proceed to the next step for service, or is there more you need to know?
That's a ridiculous range! I want an actual price. And before you ask for my address, I don't want anyone who doesn't know what they're doing coming out here.

I understand your concern, Mr. Carter. Unfortunately, without seeing the unit, I’m unable to offer a more precise price. Our technicians are highly experienced and certified. Would you like to share your address so I can check if we can send a technician to your area?
I'm at 98 Old Farm Road, but if you send some young kid out, I'll send him home. I'm not paying until it's fixed the way I want.
Thank you for your address, Mr. Carter. Let me check if you’re in our service area.
I'm sorry, Mr. Carter. Unfortunately, your location at 98 Old Farm Road is outside of our current service area. We won't be able to send a technician to your home at this time.
reason: Customer is outside of the service area.
